title: Child Shot In Hand In North Philadelphia
content:
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — A five-year-old boy was shot in his left hand Sunday night in Germantown.
Police say this happened around 6:30 on the 1300 block of East Rittenhouse Street in Philadelphia.
The boy was taken to Albert Einstein hospital and placed in stable condition. Police believe at this time the shooting was a accident, an investigation is ongoing.
